alert.note: Alert for Wyoming Black Hills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 2:19PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Butte, northern Lawrence and east central Crook Counties through 315 PM MDT... At 219 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Spearfish, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Spearfish, Belle Fourche, Whitewood, Saint Onge, Iron Creek Lake, Crow Peak, Roughlock Falls, Savoy, Bridal Veil Falls and Spearfish Canyon. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 1 and 26. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
